title: CLG VS IMT
body: People be complaining about "Oh Fiora is so broken" or "what a cheap win split push is stupid" Idk. Well those people are retarded since IMT literally were all on champs they were comfortable with (except maybe Reignover) and Darshan literally counter picked himself. Also, do you actually fucking expect them to teamfight against a raka, lux, gragas? Fuck no m9, the mere fact that CLG actually somehow got a good split push going against a team of this caliber AFTER getting counter picked as well is fucking insane tbh. And Fiora is only broken is NA apparently since other regions see picks like Quinn as better. This should've been an EASSSY win for IMT.

replies.body:
No. Rewatch the match.

* The Udyr pick.
* Aphromoor harassing ReignOver early.
* They never let ReignOver help Huhi's Quinn vs Darshan's Fiora.
* It got the point where they couldn't 1v1 Fiora.
* Udyr not only pressured ReignOver as well, but applied Trick2G level of map pressure.
* They never gave IMT an opening for a team fight. 
* Ezreal got IceBorn Gauntlet and just poke + zone in sieges during their split push. 
* They have LB double flash + tether CC and Bard's Q + R + Magical Journey + heal speed up for their escapes on top of IceBorn slows.
* This was initiated after Huhi completed QSS as his 2nd item, not for split push dueling Fiora, but to help his allies by not feeding in team fights. Its what you do when you lose lane which is you farm up and bank on team fights to get you back.

I probably still have a few points I missed, but thats what I saw up to the 20min mark. Main points are CLG's pressure on ReignOver into Huhi early on and coordinated split pushing.

> Udyr not only pressured ReignOver as well, but applied Trick2G level of map pressure.

Interestingly, Trick2G actually coached him on how to do that. That is why the gates were opened so well.
Source? I am not trolling you. I am curious as to why else he would still be so emotionally invested in CLG.

Trick2G's twitter feed. Trick2G, Hotshot, and Xsmithe all say Trick gave CLG gates lessons.
https://twitter.com/Trick2g?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor

Poppy did it to Fiorra because Fiorra was low and in that situation where she could die under tower where Fiorra was so squishy. Fiorra was able to out heal a tower plus poppy or nearly enough to survive 2 towers and a Quin which came out with a tower being destroyed. Fiorra wasn't even hard fed either when she dove on Quin. Its just Fiorra late game is obnoxious and unbalanced. Fiorra was behind Poppy and in the ended decimated Poppy in seconds while still being behind.

As for Quin and Malphite (tsm,Dig), Malphite is great for the team. TSM lost because they played poorly as a whole not because of a Quin vs Malphite. IMT played poorly(baron) but Lucian wild turtle played well, and Quin didn't feed, he was forsaken via Dyrus treatment that allowed udyr to turn the lane into a constant 2 v 1. They still could have won despite playing poorly(baron). The issue being Fiorra wasn't even that fed. It was absurd. Fiorra wasn't even grouping. Fiorra was constantly split pushing and no one could stop Fiorra due to late game Fiorra deals way to much damage enough to allow Fiorra to dive 2 towers and a Quin who wasn't that far behind.

Fiorra only had 4 kills in and Had about 3k more than Quin at the end of the game they both had 4 completed items and boots. Item wise Quin wasn't even that far behind. Kill wise IMT had the slight 1 kill lead but end game there was only a 1.5k gold difference. Wildturtle was pretty big. Fiorra wasn't even grouping and IMT played poorly with that baron call but they never had an answer for Fiorra. Then to top it off Udyr is insane right now. It even caused Runic echoes to get nerfed which will effectively hurt Champions Like fiddlesticks ganking potential.

Fiorra wasn't banned and neither was Udyr. They are just way to strong atm. One could say they should have been banned but thats just poor balancing when you have to ban 1+ champion not because they lack synergy for the team but because the numbers are so high they are insane.
